name: Road Trip Simulator
description:
DEMO #1 - Vertical Slice

Recreate the experience of driving in a small car for hours.

Navigate around other drivers, and avoid crashing into anything

Keep gas in your tank, food in your tummy, and pull over if you get too sleepy. Take an off-ramp and find somewhere to recharge, but don't spend all your money before the trip is over!

Explore the radio waves, and listen to 9 different radio stations on both AM and FM frequency bands.

The freedom of the open road is calling to you.

Are you there yet?

------------------

:Controls:

Right mouse button to Look

Left mouse button to Interact

WASD to Lean
